Title: Relates to expanding the definition of adult care facilities for the purposes of protection of people with special needs
Summary: Expands the definition of adult care facilities for the purposes of protection of people with special needs.
LawCode: Amd ยง488, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to expanding the definition of adult care facilities for the purposes of protection of people with special needs
